alert.note: Alert for Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 12 at 11:34AM EST until December 14 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Massachusetts...Rhode Island... Shawsheen River At Andover affecting Essex County. Wood River At Hope Valley affecting Washington County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Rhode Island... Pawtuxet River At Cranston affecting Kent and Providence Counties. For the Shawsheen River...including Wilmington, Andover...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pawtuxet River...including Scituate Reservoir, Cranston... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Wood River...including Hope Valley...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Shawsheen River at Andover. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Floodwaters encroach on very lowest lying business parking lots off of Route 114 in Lawrence and North Andover that are adjacent to the Shawsheen River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 27.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 0.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 29.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM EST.
